overview: In Victorian England, literary siblings Emily and Charlotte Brontë vie for the affection of the Rev. Arthur Nicholls. Along with their sister Anne, Emily and Charlotte also try to help their tormented brother Branwell, a gifted artist whose life is being destroyed by alcohol.
tagline: It tells ALL about those Brontë sisters!...They didn't dare call it love- they tried to call it Devotion
title: Devotion
